description: This file defines an interface `IEventHandler` within the `WPEFramework::Plugin` namespace, outlining four pure virtual functions for handling various events related to runtime management, window management, ripple events, and state changes. It serves as an interface for event handling in a plugin or component system.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: An interface class defining callback methods for handling different types of events related to runtime, window, ripple, and state change events.

methods.name: onRuntimeManagerEvent
methods.description: Handle runtime manager events, receiving event data as a JsonObject.

methods.name: onWindowManagerEvent
methods.description: Handle window manager events, receiving event data as a JsonObject.

methods.name: onRippleEvent
methods.description: Handle ripple events, identified by a name and accompanying data as a JsonObject.

methods.name: onStateChangeEvent
methods.description: Handle state change events, receiving event data as a JsonObject.
